casebody.data:
COMMISSIONER OF INTERNAL REVENUE v. The CRESSON CONSOLIDATED GOLD MINING & MILLING COMPANY. No. 3925. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. June 8, 1949. Theron L. Caudle, Assistant Atty. Gen., Department of Justice, and Charles Oli-phant, Ohief Counsel, Bureau of Internal Revenue, Washington, D. C., for petitioner. Thomas M. Burgess, Colorado Springs, Col., for respondent.

Before PHILLIPS, Ohief Judge, and SYMES, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Petition for review, 11 T.C. 192, docketed and dismissed, on motion of petitioner.
